title: Wave Characteristics Study
desc: Analyzing the characteristics of electromagnetic waves (RF, microwave, and photonic) and acoustic waves through simulation and experimentation.

title: Device and Technology Development
desc: Developing devices and technologies based on RF, microwave, acoustic, and photonic systems for targeted applications.

title: Technology Utilization in Applications
desc: Utilizing RF, microwave, acoustic, and photonic technologies for communication, sensing, imaging, and measurement in various fields.

title: Technology Standards Evaluation
desc: Conducting assessments and evaluations of standards relevant to the use of RF, microwave, acoustic, and photonic technologies.
